e1.name: Shadow Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' slash, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies surrounding them.

Enemies hit by the slash of a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.
Each enemy {{tip|champion}} hit by '''Zed's''' slash reduces {{ai|Living Shadow|Zed|Living Shadow's}} {{sti|cooldown}} by 2 seconds.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zed and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows slash, dealing physical damage to enemies surrounding them.
Enemies hit by the slash of a File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow are slowed for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but the slow's effectiveness is increased by 50%.
Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 2 seconds.
e1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shield}} will only block one ''Shadow Slash'' even if two hit at the same time, the {{tip|slow}} will not apply regardless.
* ''Shadow Slash'' does not interrupt attack, movement, or cast commands.

w1.name: Living Shadow
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Zed''' restores {{sti|{{as|energy}}}} whenever he and one of his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' or multiple [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' hit a mimicked ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed's''' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' dashes to the target location, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic {{ai|Razor Shuriken|Zed}} and {{ai|Shadow Slash|Zed}} while in range. ''Living Shadow'' can be recast at any time while the [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is dashing or within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} While in range of each other, '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places. If ''Living Shadow'' was recast while the [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
''If an ability is cast while the [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] Shadow is dashing, the [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] Shadow will cast that ability once it has been placed.''
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Zed restores energy whenever he and one of his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows or multiple File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows hit a mimicked ability on the same target. This may only occur once per cast ability.
Active: Zed's File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow dashes to the target location, remaining in place for 5 seconds and being able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range. Living Shadow can be recast at any time while the File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow is dashing or within its duration.
Recast: While in range of each other, Zed and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow blink to their respective locations, swapping places. If Living Shadow was recast while the File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow is dashing, the recast will instead occur once it has been placed.
If an ability is cast while the File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow is dashing, the File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow will cast that ability once it has been placed.
w1.cooldown_warn: Wiki's and Riot's cooldowns do not match: Wiki's value '{{tt|{{ap|20 to 14}}|Starts on cast}}' as '0/18/16/14/12/0' and riot's value '20,18.5,17,15.5,14' as '20/18.5/17/15.5/14'

i1.name: Contempt for the Weak
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Zed's''' [[basic attack]]s against targets {{sti|health|{{as|below 50% of their '''maximum''' health}}}} deal {{as|{{pp|key=%|6 to 10 for 3|1;7;17}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}, capped at 300 against epic {{tip|monsters}}.
''Contempt for the Weak'' can only affect enemy champions once every few seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% of their maximum health deal 1;7;17 ‒ undefined of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
Contempt for the Weak can only affect enemy champions once every few seconds.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attack applies other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (the bonus damage cannot) but does not affect [[structures]].
* ''Contempt for the Weak'' is not consumed when {{tip|dodged}} or {{tip|blind|missed}}, but it is consumed when {{tip|blocked}}.
* ''Contempt for the Weak'' considers the target's health upon landing the attack, not when it's declared.
** If the target falls below the threshold while '''Zed''' is winding up the attack, ''Contempt for the Weak'' applies, and vice versa.

q1.name: Razor Shuriken
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies struck in their path, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Zed and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows throw their spinning blades toward the target location. Each blade deals physical damage to all enemies struck in their path, reduced to 60% against units beyond the first.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 220}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Secondary Damage|{{ap|80*0.6 to 220*0.6}} {{as|(+ 60% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only blocks the damage from one ''Razor Shuriken'' even if two hit at the same time.
** ''Shurikens'' blocked by {{tip|spell shield}} still count as being hit for the reduced pass-through damage.
* If '''Zed''' buffers an attack command during ''Razor Shuriken's'' cast time the attack will perform slower than if '''Zed''' had attacked after the cast time.
** The same does not happen if '''Zed''' recasts {{ai|Living Shadow 2|Zed|Living Shadow}} during ''Razor Shuriken's'' cast time.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)
  • Secondary Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD)

r1.name: Death Mark
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Zed''' becomes {{tip|untargetable}} and, after {{fd|0.6}} seconds, he {{tip|dashes}} through the target enemy {{tip|champion|champion}} over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, after which he ''marks'' them, gains {{tip|ghosted|ghosting}} for 3 seconds, and becomes targetable again. '''Zed''' also spawns a [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' at his casting position for {{fd|7.5}} seconds which is able to mimic {{ai|Razor Shuriken|Zed}} and {{ai|Shadow Slash|Zed}} while in range. ''Death Mark'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds of his reappearance while the [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is active.

For the next 3 seconds, '''Zed''' stores a percentage of all {{tt|pre-mitigation|Damage calculated before modifiers}} {{as|physical damage}} and {{as|magic damage}} he and his [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' deal to the ''marked'' target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal {{as|physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Recast:}} Regardless of the distance between each other, '''Zed''' and the ''Death Mark'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' {{tip|blink}} to their respective locations, swapping places.
''If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is cancelled, goes on a 5 second {{sti|cooldown}}, and '''Zed''' reappears at the cast location.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Zed becomes untargetable and, after 0.6 seconds, he dashes through the target enemy champion over 0.4 seconds, after which he marks them, gains ghosting for 3 seconds, and becomes targetable again. Zed also spawns a File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow at his casting position for 7.5 seconds which is able to mimic Razor Shuriken and Shadow Slash while in range. Death Mark can be recast after 0.5 seconds of his reappearance while the File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow is active.
For the next 3 seconds, Zed stores a percentage of all pre-mitigation physical damage and magic damage he and his File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadows deal to the marked target, detonating at the end of the duration to deal physical damage.
Recast: Regardless of the distance between each other, Zed and the Death Mark File:Zed's Shadow.png Shadow blink to their respective locations, swapping places.
If the target dies or is 1950 or more units away before the dash begins, Death Mark is cancelled, goes on a 5 second cooldown, and Zed reappears at the cast location.
r1.notes:
* '''Zed''' will track the target if they change locations.
** He will dash through the target's previous location while still applying the {{as|mark|buzzword}} if they are 1950 or more units away.
*Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* The [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is spawned the moment ''Death Mark'' is cast.
* '''Zed''' will be ordered to basic attack his target after reappearing.
* The [[debuff]] for the {{as|mark|buzzword}} is named ''Marked for Death''.
* ''Death Mark's'' stored damage derives from all [[basic attack]]s, [[Champion ability|abilities]], [[item]]s, [[Runes Reforged|runes]] and [[buff]]s.
* ''Death Mark's'' [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadow'' is functionally the same as a regular one, but it lasts longer and can be swapped to regardless of range.
** The range at which it mimics '''Zed's''' abilities does not change.
* The {{as|mark|buzzword}} can be prevented by becoming {{tip|untargetable}} before it is applied (untargetability after application will not prevent the mark's detonation).
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will only block the {{as|mark's|buzzword}} application. They will not prevent '''Zed''' from initiating the cast nor block the detonation from a {{as|mark|buzzword}} that is already applied.
* If '''Zed''' dies during ''Death Mark'', the ability will cancel instantly and he will reappear at his current location. The cooldown is not compensated.
** If he enters {{tip|resurrection}} before the dash, ''Death Mark'' does not cancel. If he enters it while dashing, the dash is interrupted.
* If the {{tip|dash}} is interrupted, '''Zed''' stops, places himself to the ground (ends all displacements affecting him, but does not remove {{tip|airborne}} effects), and reappears prematurely at his current location. The {{as|mark|buzzword}} will still be applied regardless.
** '''Zed''' will remove {{tip|airborne}} effects from himself immediately upon starting the dash.
* Once '''Zed''' begins the {{tip|dash}}, two [[File:Zed's Shadow.png|20px|border]] ''Shadows'' will also appear to be dashing through his target, each one spawning a certain distance behind the target (from the right and left). These ''shadows'' do '''not''' mimic abilities and disappear immediately after they stop dashing but they grant {{tip|sight}} of their surroundings.
* ''Death Mark'' does not cancel if the target enters a {{tip|zombie state}} before the dash begins.
* If the {{as|mark's|buzzword}} {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after modifiers}} is higher than the target's '''current''' health, a ''spinning shuriken'' will appear above the victim. This does not necessarily mean the target will die, as it does not consider {{tip|shield|shields}} or other forms of [[damage modifier]]s.
{{clr}}
[[File:Spinning_Shuriken_Indicator.png|thumb|center|225px|The indicator shown in-game ''(base skin)''.]]
{{clr}}
* This following table refers for interactions while '''Zed''' is in ''Death Mark'':

effects.str: • Physical Damage: 100% AD (+ % of damage dealt)
